job.name: Hijing
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setenv NODEBUG yes # starver .DEV2 set file = $INPUTFILE0; set rung = `echo $file | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $file | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set l = `echo $file | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` set name = `echo $file | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` echo "${name}" set logName = ${name}_${rung}_${l}B.log set generF = ${name}_${rung}_${l}.gener.root if (! -r ${generF} ) then root.exe -q -b -x 'Pythia6.C('${l}','${rung}')' >& ${logName} endif
